meanings: (…하는데, 하느라고) for[in, by, from] doing, to do

vlive.korean: [원하시는 대로 모자이크는 했습니다] [무슨 사연이 있으실길래?] [We blurred the face as requested] [What's the story?] View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 이상준이 포스터로만 봤던 연세대 핫바디 그녀, 실물 영접의 순간 <이상준의 노타이틀> 7화
vlive.english: [We blurred the face as requested] [What's the story?]

vlive.korean: [대체 어디 길래?] 어딘데요? 첫 번째 판매하는 곳이 어디예요? [Where exactly is this place?] Where is it? Where's the first location? 듣기 View video 한뼘TV : [방판소년단 EP25] 여자친구X방판소년단, 레전드급 판매 콜라보레이션
vlive.english: [Where exactly is this place?] Where is it? Where's the first location?

vlive.korean: 그냥 난 소개만 시켜주면 돈 준다 길래. I just introduced her to you and got paid for that. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : 엄지원X공효진 <미씽: 사라진여자> 무비토크 라이브 ' MovieTalk Live'
vlive.english: I just introduced her to you and got paid for that.

vlive.korean: 이게 얼마나 맛있는 집이 길래 다섯 분이 동시에 얘기를 할까. I was wondering just how good that place had to be to have all 5 of your talking about it. 듣기 View video V DRAMA : 안투라지 백스테이지&레드카펫 라이브 (Entourage backstage & red carpet live)
vlive.english: I was wondering just how good that place had to be to have all 5 of your talking about it.

examples.korean: I shall not forget your kindness as long as I live. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 은혜는 길래 잊지 않겠습니다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I shall not forget your kindness as long as I live. Add to Wordbook
